@GrasshopperSpit @bearsaremean @NikkiMcR Our system is a forced labor camp created for the benefit of the few, who get to live like kings & the many,  who get to kill each other for scraps.  

People accept this because they’ve been convinced that the technological benefits of such an exploitive system will trickle down
